Dune is within the home, actually

Warner Bros. has launched a trailer showcasing the string of cinematic releases headed to theaters and streaming channel HBO Max in 2021. Buried amongst the films that feature within the thrilling montage are the first reside-circulation glimpses of the original Mortal Kombat movie.

Directed by newcomer Simon McQuoid and starring a solid of knowledgeable martial arts actors, Mortal Kombat will verbalize the story of a community of humans – alongside with original boy Cole Younger – hand-picked to picture EarthRealm in a once-in-a-abilities match held by the injurious sorcerer Shang Tsung. Whereas loads of still photographs from the movie had been printed earlier within the month, the HBO Max trailer offers us our first possess a study the movie in circulation, with blink-and-you will-trail over-them appearances by Sonya Blade, Liu Kang, and the ice-grasp himself, Sub-Zero.

Some place else within the trailer, we’re teased with photos from Denis Villeneuve’s Dune and James Gunn’s Suicide Squad, alongside short snippets of Those Who Desire Me Unnecessary, Godzilla vs. Kong, Tom & Jerry and, most importantly, House Jam: A Contemporary Legacy. All of those films will premiere day-and-date in theaters and on the streaming service, in efforts to accumulate the wheels handing over the movie industry because the COVID-19 pandemic continues.

Mortal Kombat will premiere April 16.
